Name: Committed: Mystery at Shady Pines - Premium Edition
About the game: You wake up strapped to a bed, inside an abandoned hospital. Find a way to save the patients, stop the psychotic doctor, and escape before it’s too late. Explore the inner workings of Shady Pines and solve challenging mini-games in this immersive hidden object puzzle adventure game! Uncover the truth about the doctor’s twisted experiments in Committed: The Mystery at Shady Pines! This Premium Edition includes: -Bonus Gameplay Chapter -Integrated Walkthrough -High Def Wallpapers
